promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a massive rare frilled-lizard psychic-type pokemon wearing regal armor. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or frilled-lizard. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Regilith, a a massive rare frilled-lizard psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Knock Back. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "frilled-lizard", "psychic" or "Regilith". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, frilled-lizard-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: Inhabiting deep caverns, this colossal creature uses its unique mental powers to thunderstrike interlopers, pushing them away with ease.
